NEWS.title: Revealed: Housing Agency chief sold property to McVerry Trust
NEWS.description: The sale of an investment property by the CEO of the Housing Agency to the Peter McVerry Trust raises "blatant" conflict of interest concerns, according to a corporate governance expert.
NEWS.content:
The Chief Executive of the Housing Agency, Bob Jordan, sold an investment property to the Peter McVerry Trust, Prime Time has learned.
The sale raises "blatant" conflict of interest concerns, according to corporate governance expert Jillian van Turnhout...
